attributes.action: young offenders boot camp run by injured & ex military
attributes.additional_details:
Young & repeat offenders are falling through the punishments system that courts use; I believe the many unused or partially used army bases would be ideal to turn into a youth boot camp.

Run by injured or ex Military personal that would teach them the importance of discipline and respect.

Many skills could be taught and passed onto offenders, taking them away from there gangs and shown the value of citizenship.

We have the bases, we have soldier’s egger to be involved and we most certainly have the young offenders, all we need is the government to listen! And you to sign.
